comments.author: Imad
comments.content: Great write up! Waiting for the next installment.

comments.author: sadaqat ali
comments.content:
my name is sadaqat ali and i live in canadian arctic for over a decade.

tempratures here are in -35c range this time of the years and we use snow mobiles for travel on the land and frozen sea.

will like to go on a trip around karachi in july august months is there any commercial business in karachi to organize this kind of trip.
